posts.post_content:
Looking to upgrade my set and wanted to see if anyone had any of the following in PSA 4 - 6.

Adkins, Doc
Bescher, Bob (Portrait)
Birmingham, Joe
Brown, George (Chicago) (Correct spell Browne, Chicago)
Clarke, Fred (Pittsburg, Portrait)
Donovan, Bill (Wild) (Portrait)
Flick, Elmer
Foster, Eddie
Fritz, Charlie
Hall, Bob
Hickman, Gordon
Howell, Harry (Portrait)
Jordan, Tim (Brookyn Portrait)
Kleinow, Red (Boston)
Lipe, Perry
Moriarty, George
Mullin, George (With Bat)
O'Brien, Peter
O'Hara, Bill (New York)
Oldring, Rube (Batting)
Rossman, Claude
Ryan, Ray
Snodgrass, Fred (Batting)
Stahl, Jake (Glove Shows)
Titus, John
Waddell, Rube (Portrait)

Also have a number of PSA 4's that I'd like to upgrade.  My entire set is on the registry (TRambo Collection) if you want to see what I need that is a 4.5 or lower.

PM to let me know what you have w/pricing on any of the above!

Thanks!!
I think I just saw a PSA 4 Perry Lipe on eBay for 3 something if that helps

Thanks!  I've seen everything on ebay and it's not terribly interesting.

I appreciate you posting about it, though!  Thanks again!
Thanks for the responses!!  I've picked up a number of cards already!
Still looking for a number of upgrades. PM if you have any in the list or others 4-6
